subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{der|zh|sit}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|tr=rgyu.ba|t=to go, walk, move, wander}}, {{cog|lep|yŭ}}, {{cog|raw|yɨ||to flow}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
